original_text: then you shall tell them that the waters of the Jordan were cut off before the ark of the covenant of the Lord. When it passed over the Jordan, the waters of the Jordan were cut off. So these stones shall be to the people of Israel a memorial forever.”
korean_text: 그들에게 이르기를 요단 물이 여호와의 언약궤 앞에서 끊어졌나니 곧 언약궤가 요단을 건널 때에 요단 물이 끊어졌으므로 이 돌들이 이스라엘 자손에게 영원히 기념이 되리라 하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: that the waters of the Jordan were cut off
before the ark of the covenant of the Lord
When it passed over the Jordan
the waters of the Jordan were cut off
to the people of Israel a memorial forever
